episodes.summary: Part 2 of Doug's conversation with Bisbee's Nurse Betty (Betty Lindstrom) and this time it's all about her sons, Jason and Gabe. Recorded live at the Fun House in Bisbee, AZ with Doug Stanhope, Betty Lindstrom, Jason Lindstrom ESQ. and Chad Shank. Celebrity Death Pool segment featured Jobi and Melissa Holden. Engineered by Seany. Produced by Greg Chaille.

episodes.title: The Doug Stanhope Podcast: Nurse Betty visits the Fun House
episodes.author: The Doug Stanhope Podcast
episodes.summary: Doug sits down with Nurse Betty (a.k.a. Betty Lindstrom) and discusses the ups and downs of single motherhood while moving product across the mexican border. Recorded live at the Fun House in Bisbee, AZ with Doug Stanhope, Betty Lindstrom and Chad Shank. Engineered by Seany. Produced by Greg Chaille.

episodes.title: The Doug Stanhope Podcast: Pillow Talk with Bingo's sister Kelly
episodes.author: The Doug Stanhope Podcast
episodes.summary: Doug crawls under the covers with Bingo's sister Kelly to discuss poop, sexual discovery and labia augmentation. Recorded at the Dude Rancher Lodge in Billings, MT with Doug Stanhope, Bingo's sister Kelly, Chad Shank and Greg Chaille. Engineered by Greg Chaille.

episodes.title: The Doug Stanhope Podcast: Alaska Stories pt.2
episodes.author: The Doug Stanhope Podcast
episodes.summary: Part 2 of the Alaska Podcast - Doug continues his conversation with the crew from the World Famous Chilkoot Charlie's - Mat Becker, Doran Powell, Billy Bad and Greg Chaille. Recorded in Becker's backyard bus. Engineered by Greg Chaille.

episodes.title: The Doug Stanhope Podcast: Alaska Stories pt.1
episodes.author: The Doug Stanhope Podcast
episodes.summary: Doug travels up to Anchorage, Alaska to swap stories about wild times gone by at the World Famous Chilkoot Charlie's with Matt Becker and Doran. Recorded in Becker's backyard bus. Engineered by Greg Chaille.

episodes.title: The Doug Stanhope Podcast: The Dorfman Brothers
episodes.author: The Doug Stanhope Podcast
episodes.summary: Doug talks to legendary comedy club owners, Andrew & Brian Dorfman. Recorded in the green room of Zanies Nashville. Engineered by Chaille.

episodes.title: The Doug Stanhope Podcast: Rob Mungle in Houston
episodes.author: The Doug Stanhope Podcast
episodes.summary: Doug talks road stories with comedian Rob Mungle and Houston friend Jack&Dino in the Houston Improv green room. Recorded March 12, 2013 in the Houston Improv green room. Junior Stopka, Bingo and Ggreg Chaille were also hanging around. This was the first night on the second leg of the Big Stink Tour.

episodes.title: Doug Stanhope's Podcast: Goosekirk
episodes.author: The Doug Stanhope Podcast
episodes.summary: Doug Stanhope interviews Goosekirk about his 5 year prison stay in Brazil on drug trafficking charges. Interview was conducted on the patio of the Doug Fir Lounge at the Jupiter Hotel in Portland, OR. Attending the interview and making comments off mic - Andy Andrist, Bingo!, Ggreg Chaille and a guy that looked like Joaquin Phoenix.

episodes.title: Doug Stanhope's Podcast: Andy's Molester
episodes.author: The Doug Stanhope Podcast
episodes.summary: Doug Stanhope talks with Andy Andrist about confronting his molester. Interview was conducted Feb 2, 2013 in Bisbee, AZ and includes Chris Castle and Attorney Jay Kirschner.
